00043 typedef struct _nitf_DateTime
00044 {
00045     int year;
00046     int month;
00047     int dayOfMonth;
00048     int dayOfWeek;
00049     int dayOfYear;
00050     int hour;
00051     int minute;
00052     double second;
00053     double timeInMillis;
00054 } nitf_DateTime;
